positions.subtitle: International Relations Cell, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: Working under the aegis of Dean and Associate Dean of International Relations, International Relations Cell thrives to improve the global footprint of IIT Kharagpur by conducting year-long activities for enhancing the mobility of students and faculty both inwards and outwards. Our major initiatives include the Foreign Training Program ( providing foreign internships to IIT Kharagpur students), Semester Exchange Program, Dyuti ( a week-long global village for international students), Young Innovators Program(  an event enhancing the brand value of IIT Kharagpur among school students), competitions( Hult Prize), scholarships (ADSIP, SGRIP, ASEAN, GKF, IITKGPF) â€¢ Strategized the execution of first-ever International YIP, getting applause from the office of President of Indiaâ€¢ New Initiatives Executed: YIP, Hult Prize, GKF scholarship, Dyutiâ€¢ Initiatives ideated: Harvard Project for Asian and International Relations at IIT Kharagpur
positions.title: Advisor
positions.description_html:
Working under the aegis of Dean and Associate Dean of International Relations, International Relations Cell thrives to improve the global footprint of IIT Kharagpur by conducting year-long activities for enhancing the mobility of students and faculty both inwards and outwards. Our major initiatives include the Foreign Training Program ( providing foreign internships to IIT Kharagpur students), Semester Exchange Program, Dyuti ( a week-long global village for international students), Young Innovators Program( an event enhancing the brand value of IIT Kharagpur among school students), competitions( Hult Prize), scholarships (ADSIP, SGRIP, ASEAN, GKF, IITKGPF)
â€¢ Strategized the execution of first-ever International YIP, getting applause from the office of President of India
â€¢ New Initiatives Executed: YIP, Hult Prize, GKF scholarship, Dyuti
â€¢ Initiatives ideated: Harvard Project for Asian and International Relations at IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Management Trainee
experience.description: Project:  Bid advisory to a leading logistics firm to aid its investment in a 200-acre SEZ, worth INR 4.2 billion â€¢ Identified 7 potential industries for tenanting the land parcel by examining value chains of each of the industries, using Forward Backward integration â€¢ Enlisted frontline products of shortlisted potential industries for their manufacturing feasibility in the plot by inspecting product's HS and NIC codes â€¢ Formulated a company shortlisting tool, finally shortlisting 50 companies for tenanting the SEZ
experience.description_html: Project: Bid advisory to a leading logistics firm to aid its investment in a 200-acre SEZ, worth INR 4.2 billion â€¢ Identified 7 potential industries for tenanting the land parcel by examining value chains of each of the industries, using Forward Backward integration â€¢ Enlisted frontline products of shortlisted potential industries for their manufacturing feasibility in the plot by inspecting product's HS and NIC codes â€¢ Formulated a company shortlisting tool, finally shortlisting 50 companies for tenanting the SEZ
